info.title: Infoblox DISCOVERY API
info.description: OpenAPI specification for Infoblox NIOS WAPI DISCOVERY objects

get.description: Returns a list of discovery:device objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The IPv4 Address or IPv6 Address of the device.

parameters.name: chassis_serial_number
parameters.description: The device chassis serial number.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location of the device.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The model name of the device.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the device.

parameters.name: network_view
parameters.description: The name of the network view in which this device resides.

parameters.name: os_version
parameters.description: The Operating System version running on the device.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the device.

parameters.name: vendor
parameters.description: The vendor name of the device.

get.description: Returns a list of discovery:deviceinterface objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: aggr_interface_name
parameters.description: Name of the port channel current interface belongs to.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the interface.

parameters.name: mac
parameters.description: The MAC address of the interface.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The interface system name.

parameters.name: network_view
parameters.description: Th name of the network view.

parameters.name: oper_status
parameters.description: Operating state of the interface.

parameters.name: speed
parameters.description: The interface speed in bps.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of interface.

parameters.name: vpc_peer
parameters.description: Aggregated interface name of vPC peer device current port is connected to.

parameters.name: vrf_description
parameters.description: The description of the Virtual Routing and Forwarding (VRF) associated with the interface.

parameters.name: vrf_name
parameters.description: The name of the Virtual Routing and Forwarding (VRF) associated with the interface.

parameters.name: vrf_rd
parameters.description: The route distinguisher of the Virtual Routing and Forwarding (VRF) associated with the interface.

get.description: Returns a list of vdiscoverytask objects matching the search criteria

parameters.name: accounts_list
parameters.description: The AWS Account IDs or GCP Project IDs list associated with this task.

parameters.name: cdiscovery_file_token
parameters.description: The AWS account IDs or GCP Project IDs file's token.

parameters.name: dns_view_private_ip
parameters.description: The DNS view name for private IPs.

parameters.name: dns_view_public_ip
parameters.description: The DNS view name for public IPs.

parameters.name: domain_name
parameters.description: The name of the domain to use with keystone v3.

parameters.name: driver_type
parameters.description: Type of discovery driver.

parameters.name: enable_filter
parameters.description: Enable filter for cloud discovery task

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether to enabled the cloud discovery or not.

parameters.name: fqdn_or_ip
parameters.description: FQDN or IP of the cloud management platform.

parameters.name: govcloud_enabled
parameters.description: Indicates if gov cloud is enabled or disabled.

parameters.name: identity_version
parameters.description: Identity service version.

parameters.name: member
parameters.description: Member on which cloud discovery will be run.

parameters.name: multiple_accounts_sync_policy
parameters.description: Discover all child accounts or Upload child account ids to discover..

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of this cloud discovery task. Uniquely identify a task.

parameters.name: network_filter
parameters.description: Options to filter the networks in cdiscovery task.

parameters.name: port
parameters.description: Connection port used for connecting to the cloud management platform.

parameters.name: private_network_view
parameters.description: Network view for private IPs.

parameters.name: private_network_view_mapping_policy
parameters.description: Mapping policy for the network view for private IPs in discovery data.

parameters.name: protocol
parameters.description: Connection protocol used for connecting to the cloud management platform.

parameters.name: public_network_view
parameters.description: Network view for public IPs.

parameters.name: public_network_view_mapping_policy
parameters.description: Mapping policy for the network view for public IPs in discovery data.

parameters.name: role_arn
parameters.description: Role ARN for syncing child accounts; maximum 128 characters.

parameters.name: selected_regions
parameters.description: String containing selected regions for discovery in comma separated format.

parameters.name: service_account_file
parameters.description: The service_account_file for GCP.

parameters.name: service_account_file_token
parameters.description: Service account file's token.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Current state of this task.

parameters.name: sync_child_accounts
parameters.description: Synchronizing child accounts is enabled or disabled.

parameters.name: update_dns_view_private_ip
parameters.description: If set to true, the appliance uses a specific DNS view for private IPs.

parameters.name: update_dns_view_public_ip
parameters.description: If set to true, the appliance uses a specific DNS view for public IPs.

parameters.name: use_identity
parameters.description: If set true, all keystone connection will use "/identity" endpoint and port value will be ignored.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username used for connecting to the cloud management platform.

parameters.description: Reference of the vdiscoverytask object

ReturnFields.name: _return_fields
ReturnFields.description: Enter the field names followed by comma

ReturnFieldsPlus.name: _return_fields+
ReturnFieldsPlus.description: Enter the field names followed by comma, this returns the required fields along with the default fields

MaxResults.name: _max_results
MaxResults.description: Enter the number of results to be fetched

ReturnAsObject.name: _return_as_object
ReturnAsObject.description: Select 1 if result is required as an object

PageId.name: _page_id
PageId.description: Page id for retrieving next page of results

Schema.name: _schema
Schema.description: Return schema for this object type

Inheritance.name: _inheritance
Inheritance.description: If this option is set to True, fields which support inheritance, will display data properly.

value.description: The value of the extensible attribute.

ExtAttrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object.

address.description: The IPv4 Address or IPv6 Address of the device.

address_ref.description: The ref to management IP address of the device.

available_mgmt_ips.description: The list of available management IPs for the device.

cap_admin_status_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the admin status of an interface of the device.

cap_admin_status_na_reason.description: The reason that the edit admin status action is not available.

cap_description_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the description of an interface on the device.

cap_description_na_reason.description: The reason that the edit description action is not available.

cap_net_deprovisioning_ind.description: Determines whether to deprovision a network from interfaces of the device.

cap_net_deprovisioning_na_reason.description: The reason that the deprovision a network from interfaces of this device is not available.

cap_net_provisioning_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the network associated to an interface of the device.

cap_net_provisioning_na_reason.description: The reason that network provisioning is not available.

cap_net_vlan_provisioning_ind.description: Determines whether to create a VLAN and then provision a network to the interface of the device.

cap_net_vlan_provisioning_na_reason.description: The reason that network provisioning on VLAN is not available.

cap_vlan_assignment_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the VLAN assignement of an interface of the device.

cap_vlan_assignment_na_reason.description: The reason that VLAN assignment action is not available.

cap_voice_vlan_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the voice VLAN assignment of an interface of the device.

cap_voice_vlan_na_reason.description: The reason that voice VLAN assignment action is not available.

extattrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object. For valid values for extensible attributes, see {extattrs:values}.

model.description: The model name of the device.

network.description: The ref to the network to which belongs the management IP address belongs.

network_infos.description: The list of networks to which the device interfaces belong.

network_view.description: The name of the network view in which this device resides.

networks.description: The list of networks to which the device interfaces belong.

os_version.description: The Operating System version running on the device.

privileged_polling.description: A flag indicated that NI should send enable command when interacting with device.

user_defined_mgmt_ip.description: User-defined management IP address of the device.

vendor.description: The vendor name of the device.

vlan_infos.description: The list of VLAN information associated with the device.

network.description: The ref to the network to which the management IP address belongs.

network_str.description: The Network address in format address/cidr.

interfaces_count.description: The total number of available interfaces on this device.

admin_up_oper_up_count.description: The total number of interfaces which have both administrative and operating states as 'UP'.

admin_up_oper_down_count.description: The total number of interfaces which have administrative state 'UP' and oper state 'DOWN'.

admin_down_oper_down_count.description: The total number of interfaces which have administrative state 'DOWN' and operating state 'DOWN'.

description.description: The description of the device component.

device.description: A reference to a device, to which this component belongs to.

model.description: The model of the device component.

serial.description: The serial number of the device component.

aggr_interface_name.description: Name of the port channel current interface belongs to.

cap_if_admin_status_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the admin status of the interface.

cap_if_admin_status_na_reason.description: The reason that the edit admin status action is not available.

cap_if_description_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the description of the interface.

cap_if_description_na_reason.description: The reason that the edit description action is not available.

cap_if_net_deprovisioning_ipv4_ind.description: Determines whether to deprovision a IPv4 network from the interfaces.

cap_if_net_deprovisioning_ipv4_na_reason.description: The reason that the deprovision a IPv4 network from the interface.

cap_if_net_deprovisioning_ipv6_ind.description: Determines whether to deprovision a IPv6 network from the interfaces.

cap_if_net_deprovisioning_ipv6_na_reason.description: The reason that the deprovision a IPv6 network from the interface.

cap_if_net_provisioning_ipv4_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the IPv4 network associated to the interface.

cap_if_net_provisioning_ipv4_na_reason.description: The reason that IPv4 network provisioning is not available.

cap_if_net_provisioning_ipv6_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the IPv6 network associated to the interface.

cap_if_net_provisioning_ipv6_na_reason.description: The reason that IPv6 network provisioning is not available.

cap_if_vlan_assignment_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the VLAN assignement of the interface.

cap_if_vlan_assignment_na_reason.description: The reason that VLAN assignment action is not available.

cap_if_voice_vlan_ind.description: Determines whether to modify the voice VLAN assignement of the interface.

cap_if_voice_vlan_na_reason.description: The reason that voice VLAN assignment action is not available.

device.description: The ref to the device to which the interface belongs.

duplex.description: The duplex state of the interface.

extattrs.description: Extensible attributes associated with the object. For valid values for extensible attributes, see {extattrs:values}.

ifaddr_infos.description: List of IFaddr information associated with the interface.

index.description: The interface index number, as reported by SNMP.

last_change.description: Timestamp of the last interface property change detected.

link_aggregation.description: This field indicates if this is a link aggregation interface.

mac.description: The MAC address of the interface.

network_view.description: Th name of the network view.

port_fast.description: The Port Fast status of the interface.

reserved_object.description: The reference to object(Host/FixedAddress/GridMember) to which this port is reserved.

trunk_status.description: Indicates if the interface is tagged as a VLAN trunk or not.

vlan_infos.description: The list of VLAN information associated with the interface.

vpc_peer.description: Aggregated interface name of vPC peer device current port is connected to.

vpc_peer_device.description: The reference to vPC peer device.

vrf_description.description: The description of the Virtual Routing and Forwarding (VRF) associated with the interface.

vrf_name.description: The name of the Virtual Routing and Forwarding (VRF) associated with the interface.

vrf_rd.description: The route distinguisher of the Virtual Routing and Forwarding (VRF) associated with the interface.

details.description: The associated port control task details.

id.description: The ID of the associated port control task.

status.description: The task status of the associated port control task.

is_synchronized.description: True if this port control task is completed and matched with current discovered value.

details.description: The associated port control task details.

id.description: The ID of the associated port control task.

status.description: The task status of the associated port control task.

is_synchronized.description: True if this port control task is completed and matched with current discovered value.

address.description: The IPv4 Address or IPv6 Address of the device.

network.description: The network to which this device belongs, in IPv4 Address/CIDR format.

data_vlan_info.description: The configured data VLAN ID and the name of the interface.

voice_vlan_info.description: The configured voice VLAN id and name of interface.

details.description: The associated port control task details.

id.description: The ID of the associated port control task.

status.description: The task status of the associated port control task.

is_synchronized.description: True if this port control task is completed and matched with current discovered value.

author.description: The developer of the device support bundle.

integrated_ind.description: Determines whether the device support bundle is integrated or imported. Note that integrated support bundles cannot be removed.

name.description: The descriptive device name for the device support bundle.

version.description: The version of the currently active device support bundle.

community_string.description: The SNMP community string of the discovery diagnostic task.

debug_snmp.description: The SNMP debug flag of the discovery diagnostic task.

force_test.description: The force test flag of the discovery diagnostic task.

ip_address.description: The IP address of the discovery diagnostic task.

network_view.description: The network view name of the discovery diagnostic task.

start_time.description: The time when the discovery diagnostic task was started.

task_id.description: The ID of the discovery diagnostic task.

dns_lookup_option.description: The type of the devices the DNS processor operates on.

dns_lookup_throttle.description: The percentage of available capacity the DNS processor operates at. Valid values are unsigned integer between 1 and 100, inclusive.

enable_auto_conversion.description: The flag that enables automatic conversion of discovered data.

enable_auto_updates.description: The flag that enables updating discovered data for managed objects.

ignore_conflict_duration.description: Determines the timeout to ignore the discovery conflict duration (in seconds).

same_port_control_discovery_blackout.description: Determines if the same port control is used for discovery blackout.

snmpv1v2_credentials.description: Discovery SNMP v1 and v2 credentials.

unmanaged_ips_limit.description: Limit of discovered unmanaged IP address which determines how frequently the user is notified about the new unmanaged IP address in a particular network.

unmanaged_ips_timeout.description: Determines the timeout between two notifications (in seconds) about the new unmanaged IP address in a particular network. The value must be between 60 seconds and the number of seconds remaining to Jan 2038.

vrf_mapping_policy.description: The policy type used to define the behavior of the VRF mapping.

purge_expired_device_data.description: The number of days a device remains in database after it is no longer found in network.

enable_purge_expired_endhost_data.description: Determines if purge of expired end host data is enabled.

purge_expired_endhost_data.description: The number of days a end host remains in database after it is no longer found in network.

ping_sweep_interval.description: The hourly wait interval between ping sweeps for individual discovery ranges.

arp_cache_refresh_interval.description: The refresh interval in seconds for ARP cache.

polling_authenticate_snmpv2c_or_later_on.description: Determines if polling and authenticating using SNMPv2c or later is enabled.

disable_discovery_outside_ipam.description: Determines if discovery of networks that are not in IPAM is disabled.

dhcp_router_as_seed.description: Determines if DHCP router is used as seed for discovery.

syslog_ipam_events.description: Determines if syslogging of IPAM sync events is enabled.

syslog_network_events.description: Determines if syslogging of Network sync events is enabled.

networks_mapping_policy.description: Policy of mapping SDN networks to network views. To obtain mapping table use the object discovery:sdnnetwork

disable_sdn_discovery_outside_ipam.description: Disable discovery of SDN subnets that are not in IPAM.

proxy_address.description: Host name or ip address of the proxy server.

proxy_port.description: Port number the proxy listens on.

execution_interval.description: Application execution interval in seconds. Must be greater than or equal to 86400 seconds (1 day).

network_interface_type.description: The type of the network interface on consolidator member.

network_interface_virtual_ip.description: The interface for Advisor application on consolidator member.

address.description: Host name or ip address of the Advisor server

port.description: Port number the Advisor server listens on

auth_type.description: Authentication type used for Advisor server

last_exec_time.description: Timestamp of the Advisor last execution attempt'

last_exec_status.description: Result of the last execution attempt of Advisor

last_exec_details.description: Details of the last execution attempt of Advisor. Describes the error or warning with a string

last_run_now_time.description: Timestamp of the Advisor last Run Now attempt'

last_run_now_status.description: Result of the last Run Now attempt of Advisor

last_run_now_details.description: Details of the last Run Now attempt of Advisor. Describes the error or warning with a string

network_view.description: The network view name which contains discovered data for convert.

type.description: The object type used to define the converted object.

format.description: Template string used to generate host names.

condition.description: The string that contains condition of use the auto conversion settings.

port_scanning.description: Determines whether port scanning is enabled or not.

device_profile.description: Determines whether device profile is enabled or not.

snmp_collection.description: Determines whether SNMP collection is enabled or not.

cli_collection.description: Determines whether CLI collection is enabled or not.

netbios_scanning.description: Determines whether netbios scanning is enabled or not.

complete_ping_sweep.description: Determines whether complete ping sweep is enabled or not.

smart_subnet_ping_sweep.description: Determines whether smart subnet ping sweep is enabled or not.

auto_arp_refresh_before_switch_port_poll.description: Determines whether auto ARP refresh before switch port polling is enabled or not.

switch_port_data_collection_polling.description: A switch port data collection polling mode.

switch_port_data_collection_polling_sche.description: A Schedule Setting struct that determines switch port data collection polling schedule.

switch_port_data_collection_polling_inte.description: Indicates the interval for switch port data collection polling.

weekdays.description: Days of the week when scheduling is triggered.

time_zone.description: The time zone for the schedule.

recurring_time.description: The recurring time for the schedule in Epoch seconds format. This field is obsolete and is preserved only for backward compatibility purposes. Please use other applicable fields to define the recurring schedule. DO NOT use recurring_time together with these fields. If you use recurring_time with other fields to define the recurring schedule, recurring_time has priority over year, hour_of_day, and minutes_past_hour and will override the values of these fields, although it does not override month and day_of_month. In this case, the recurring time value might be different than the intended value that you define.

frequency.description: The frequency for the scheduled task.

every.description: The number of frequency to wait before repeating the scheduled task.

minutes_past_hour.description: The minutes past the hour for the scheduled task.

hour_of_day.description: The hour of day for the scheduled task.

year.description: The year for the scheduled task.

month.description: The month for the scheduled task.

day_of_month.description: The day of the month for the scheduled task.

repeat.description: Indicates if the scheduled task will be repeated or run only once.

disable.description: If set to True, the scheduled task is disabled.

default_network_view.description: Default network view to map collected SDN networks.

end_host_polling_interval.description: Valid SDN end host polling interval in seconds. Must be between 1800 and 86400 seconds.

end_host_polling_schedule.description: A Schedule Setting struct that determines SDN end host polling schedule.

criteria.description: Pattern or extended POSIX regular expression matching the Device Hint. The regular expression string should contain the leading caret anchor ^ and the trailing dollar anchor $ symbols.

blackout_duration.description: The blackout duration in seconds; minimum value is 1 minute.

accounts_list.description: The AWS Account IDs or GCP Project IDs list associated with this task.

allow_unsecured_connection.description: Allow unsecured connection over HTTPS and bypass validation of the remote SSL certificate.

auto_consolidate_cloud_ea.description: Whether to insert or update cloud EAs with discovery data.

auto_consolidate_managed_tenant.description: Whether to replace managed tenant with discovery tenant data.

auto_consolidate_managed_vm.description: Whether to replace managed virtual machine with discovery vm data.

auto_create_dns_hostname_template.description: Template string used to generate host name.

auto_create_dns_record.description: Control whether to create or update DNS record using discovered data.

auto_create_dns_record_type.description: Indicates the type of record to create if the auto create DNS record is enabled.

cdiscovery_file_token.description: The AWS account IDs or GCP Project IDs file's token.

credentials_type.description: Credentials type used for connecting to the cloud management platform.

dns_view_private_ip.description: The DNS view name for private IPs.

dns_view_public_ip.description: The DNS view name for public IPs.

domain_name.description: The name of the domain to use with keystone v3.

enable_filter.description: Enable filter for cloud discovery task

enabled.description: Whether to enabled the cloud discovery or not.

fqdn_or_ip.description: FQDN or IP of the cloud management platform.

govcloud_enabled.description: Indicates if gov cloud is enabled or disabled.

member.description: Member on which cloud discovery will be run.

merge_data.description: Whether to replace the old data with new or not.

multiple_accounts_sync_policy.description: Discover all child accounts or Upload child account ids to discover..

name.description: Name of this cloud discovery task. Uniquely identify a task.

network_filter.description: Options to filter the networks in cdiscovery task.

network_list.description: List of networks to filter in cdiscovery task.

password.description: Password used for connecting to the cloud management platform.

port.description: Connection port used for connecting to the cloud management platform.

private_network_view_mapping_policy.description: Mapping policy for the network view for private IPs in discovery data.

protocol.description: Connection protocol used for connecting to the cloud management platform.

public_network_view_mapping_policy.description: Mapping policy for the network view for public IPs in discovery data.

role_arn.description: Role ARN for syncing child accounts; maximum 128 characters.

selected_regions.description: String containing selected regions for discovery in comma separated format.

state_msg.description: State message of the complete discovery process.

sync_child_accounts.description: Synchronizing child accounts is enabled or disabled.

update_dns_view_private_ip.description: If set to true, the appliance uses a specific DNS view for private IPs.

update_dns_view_public_ip.description: If set to true, the appliance uses a specific DNS view for public IPs.

update_metadata.description: Whether to update metadata as a result of this network discovery.

use_identity.description: If set true, all keystone connection will use "/identity" endpoint and port value will be ignored.

username.description: Username used for connecting to the cloud management platform.

weekdays.description: Days of the week when scheduling is triggered.

time_zone.description: The time zone for the schedule.

recurring_time.description: The recurring time for the schedule in Epoch seconds format. This field is obsolete and is preserved only for backward compatibility purposes. Please use other applicable fields to define the recurring schedule. DO NOT use recurring_time together with these fields. If you use recurring_time with other fields to define the recurring schedule, recurring_time has priority over year, hour_of_day, and minutes_past_hour and will override the values of these fields, although it does not override month and day_of_month. In this case, the recurring time value might be different than the intended value that you define.

every.description: The number of frequency to wait before repeating the scheduled task.

month.description: The month for the scheduled task.

day_of_month.description: The day of the month for the scheduled task.
